readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/tgrosinger/tw5-checklist"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://tgrosinger.github.io/tw5-checklist/index.html">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://tgrosinger.github.io/tw5-checklist/index.html"/></$button>

示例：

```
[ ] Milk
[ ] Eggs
[x] Bread
```
